messages.message:
Reminder for anyone who wants to be pinged in Slack whenever someone requests a review, or mentioned you, or replied to you:
1. Go to Github to set a scheduled reminder (https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/how-tos/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-your-membership-in-organizations/managing-your-scheduled-reminders#creating-scheduled-reminders-for-your-personal-account).
2. Set your settings like in the screenshot. It's key to not have *Days* or *Times* set to ensure live updates.
3. Save.
Despite the name, GitHub's Scheduled Reminders gives live updates.
